pullrequest.title: fix sandia hand visuals in rviz

content.raw: Based on our discussion: instead of using a revolute joint with zero limits to attach the IMU, switch to a fixed joint and add the IMU as a sensor offset from the pelvis link. Then modify AtlasPlugin to read IMU data from the sensor and publish it in the "imu_link" frame. The pelvis->imu_link transform will be published by robot_state_publisher.
